mapper.insert:
insert into p2p_borrow_dtl ( borrow_id, invest_biz_id, invest_order_sn, trade_amt, match_share, customer_id, customer_name, customer_id_card, customer_bank_id, bank_code, base_bank_name, bank_account, phone, create_time, update_time, creator, reviser, logic_state, biz_state ) values
( #{item.borrowId}, #{item.investBizId}, #{item.investOrderSn}, #{item.tradeAmt}, #{item.matchShare}, #{item.customerId}, #{item.customerName}, #{item.customerIdCard}, #{item.customerBankId}, #{item.bankCode}, #{item.baseBankName}, #{item.bankAccount}, #{item.phone}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.creator}, #{item.reviser}, #{item.logicState}, #{item.bizState} )
